name: MindFusion.Diagramming
summary: A flow diagramming library for iOS.
description:
MindFusion.Diagramming for iOS (aka SwiftDiagram) provides the ability to create and display various kinds of interactive diagrams. The component supports workflow, flowchart and process diagrams, object hierarchy and relationship charts, entity-relationship diagrams, structures like graphs and trees.
Every behavioral and appearance aspect of SwiftDiagram can be customized as suits best your project. Diagram elements can have different styles, colors, fonts and pictures. The control's programming model comprises hundreds of methods, properties and events.
The diagram is implemented using the Swift language and Cocoa Touch, and does not rely on third party libraries.
 The xcframework deployed by this Pod requires version 5.4+ of the Swift Compiler. Make sure the SWIFT_VERSION value in Pods' target is set accordingly.
